Body:
"""
    Test of aggregate bequest function.
    """
BQ = aggr.get_BQ(r, b_splus1, j, p, method, PreTP)
assert np.allclose(BQ, expected)
pytest.mark.parametrize('r,b_splus1,j,p,method,PreTP,expected', test_data,
    ids=['SS, all j', 'SS, one j', 'TPI, all j', 'TPI, one j',
    'Pre-TP, all j', 'Pre-TP, one j', 'Use zeta, SS, one j',
    'Use zeta, TPI, one j', 'Use zeta, TPI, all j'])
